member.name: T:JetBrains.Standalone.TextControl.TextControl.TextControlComponents.StandaloneTextControlComponentAttribute
member.summary: Component classes which wire up a to an .

summary.para: Syntax editor from/to document coordinates conversion.

Actipro does not preserve line endings. It replaces all line endings with single '\n'. As a result Actipro's syntax document text differs from the original 's text. It's not possible to directly convert Actipro offset to document offset. We have to translate Actipro coords to document line/column (which are the same for Actipro and IDocument) and than document line/column to R# document offset (and vice versa).
is not a text control component. It requires for correct conversions and it is created as an explicit parameter for the text control component container.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Standalone.TextControl.TextControl.TextControlComponents.SyntaxEditorQuickInfo.Context
